gui.replikaentropie.nonogram.help.title: How to solve a Nonogram
gui.replikaentropie.nonogram.help.conten:
- Numbers show filled cell runs
- Runs stay in order, separated by empty space
- Left-click: fill; right-click: mark empty
- Match each row/column to its clues
research.replikaentropie.research/sky_sc: You successfully restored the [data] that was [corrupt]ed. Thank you! Next, [please] craft a Handheld Analyzer to scan a block and [decrypt] the next entry.
research.replikaentropie.research/handhe: Good job! Keep [scan]ning [blocks] to [collect] data [points], then use this tablet to [unlock] the good [stuff]! Continue with the Recycler to get started on your journey.
research.replikaentropie.research/entrop: Information is [power], and the passing of time its [generator]; [no] cables, [no] sockets, just entropy. Embedded in every machine. Infinite energy. Don't worry about it [too hard].
research.replikaentropie.research/recycl: Y[o]u may [finally] say goodbye to your unwanted belongings. Try throwing [some] things into the Recycler and see what it spits out. Note that it only takes items, not [blocks].
research.replikaentropie.research/burst_: We revolut[ionized] power de[liver]y once, and now we've taken it to the next level. Meet Burst™, our power [compression] chip that [brings] entr[op]ic [energy] to the tip of your hands.
research.replikaentropie.research/fabric: "Aller [gut]en Dinge sind drei" is what our [fat]hers [used to] say. Three is good. That's why we [develop]ed the Fabricator. Scrap, [biomass], and fragments. Three inputs, one output. Simple, effective.
research.replikaentropie.research/entrop: Sc[a]nning things is [fun]. So is dancing. This machine scans the [dance] of the w[or]ld around it. It's [free data], [real]ly. You just need to perform.
The basel[i]ne of recycling, our be[love]d scrap. Turn your junk into value by repurposing it with our Recycler. And if [you] want to actually use the scrap, just keep on sky scraping.
research.replikaentropie.research/biomas: What is the composition of a [human]? Alchem[is]ts have wondered for centuries. We [now] know the answer: 100% Biomass. But let's not [sacrifice] people for the sake of progress. Trees will do [too].
research.replikaentropie.research/bioste: Mixing the sturdiness of scrap and [the] liveliness of [biomass] leads to some interest[in]g effects. Bio[steel] cre[ate]s a sym[biotic] bond with its [contacts] and can repair itself.
research.replikaentropie.research/fragme: Tying [the] fabric of [reality] together, this [is] the metaphasal polyreal[i]ty crystal. We just say "fragments" because whoever c[am]e up with the scientific name must be in[sane].
research.replikaentropie.research/assemb: You're ready to [assemble] things. St[art] by assembling the assembler. Once [as]sembled, put in an [a]ssembly ticket and the assembly [resource]s to assemble the assemblee.
Are [you] looking for an assembly ticket? Try [unlock]ing the next block, you should get an option to [print] a ticket [on] the [fabricator].
research.replikaentropie.research/fragme: Digging t[oo] d[ee]p can have some side effects. Th[is] waste [pro]duct is not the easiest to get rid of, as it's very explosive and emits [pain]ful particles that stick to you.
research.replikaentropie.research/stompe: What if [yo]u could become the [jack]hammer? These boots are like a reverse po[go] stick. Gr[eat] for digging [a] hole. Not so great for getting back out of t[hat] hole.
research.replikaentropie.research/magpha: Magnetic interference at the tip of your [toes]. Defy the laws [of] physics and set your [feet] past the shore. Please be aw[are] of swimm[in]g pool rules before you make that leap in [the Nether].
research.replikaentropie.research/nightv: Potions are so 1669. Put these [bad] boys on your [eyes] and let the green sun [guide] you in your [darker journeys]. Caution advised in creeper-infested areas.
research.replikaentropie.research/bright: We figu[red] out a way to [remove] the [green] tint: Just om[it] the green dye! [Much bright]er [now]. No more need to be [scare]d of the [dark]. With Burst™, you'll [a]l[way]s light your own way.
research.replikaentropie.research/burst_: [It's] not just a screwdriver on [a stick. It's a] Burst™ screwdriver on a [stick]! Speeds [up] in the rhythm of [break]ing blocks w[it]h similar hardness. Our horiz[on]tal [jack]hammer.
research.replikaentropie.research/semiso: Unlock the true power of [your] legs by letting your [pants] walk them for you. Wearers [are] advised to follow their [local] traffic laws at all times.
research.replikaentropie.research/nullph: Originally [design]ed to enter our [waste] silos [with]out letting [bad] things out. Nowadays many [people] use it for entrance to their secret villain lairs.
research.replikaentropie.research/slowph: They're not [actually] slow. James really [messed up] on the marketing here. They [just] slow d[own] the particles below them, causing water to [free]ze and [lava] to solidify.
research.replikaentropie.research/spring: W[ha]t [bet]ter way to escape an angered [tom]cat than awakening the tomcat inside of you? Jump[start] your escape with [our] widely adopted Spring Boot [techno]logy.
research.replikaentropie.research/ore_va: Suck [the] ore right out of that [rock]. Great [tool] to ac[company] you while burst drilling, th[is] lets you collect ore without losing momentum or [leaving] behind [holes].
research.replikaentropie.research/gravil: Spread [you]r wings and [fly] like a hummingbird! Reach even the [to]ppest of [top]s. Warning: Flight is temporary. [We] recommend keeping track of your Burst™; [don't] fall! Take [care] and fly safely.
research.replikaentropie.research/cobble: When [water] meets lava at the right angle, it [somehow] creates an infinite amount of matter. We use this matter to [create] an infinite amount of [scrap], slowly.
research.replikaentropie.research/biomas: The recycler [does] an alright job at turning m[ash]ed plants into biomass, but it does not [look] eco-friendly. The biomass incubator is more efficient and [better] PR.
Replace plants with [big]ger, breathing plants to witness our newest [breath]taking upgrade to biomass production. Put some swords inside, [so]me animals around, and [keep] your [distance].
research.replikaentropie.research/defrag: Optimized for [break]ing things down into fragments without risk. Processes f[our] items at once, consuming them in the process. P[lease] don't look directly at the glass.
research.replikaentropie.research/lavasc: When water meets [lava] at an even righter angle, [i]t creates even harder matter. The downside is, it [drink]s up the lava. But [it]'s faster scrap.
research.replikaentropie.research/replik: The last step towards [assembling] a Replika Suit is the frame. We use a fabricated [skin]-like material [as] a base for the s[u]it. It feels gross at first, but you'll [grow] into it.
It's here: your [very] own Replika Suit factory. Place a frame inside, sur[round] it with up to 8 suitable [mod]ules, and then press Assemble.
research.replikaentropie.research/hazmat: Those [painful] p[art]icles from fragmental waste [so]und [pretty] scary. Use your Fabr[i]cator to cre[ate] some Hazmat Lining and cover [your]self up. Don't get a [tear] in it!
research.replikaentropie.research/fragme: Extr[a]ct fragments without destroying the item. Use a [variety of] items for best results. Please w[ear] protective [clothing], as the machine emits particles [that] can be harmful to your [heal]th.
research.replikaentropie.research/world_: This little guy is hungry and will [eat] your house. But joke's on [him], you'll get some scrap from it [to]o. So who is really [win]ning here?! ... on second thought, maybe don't pl[a]ce it in your [house].
research.replikaentropie.research/chaos_: Even [the] most elegant [dancer]s get tired one day. Is th[is] data we're collecting even valu[a]ble? I bet no one will notice the bogus data this [machine] will generate...
jei.replikaentropie.assembly_ticket.info: Assembly Tickets can be printed using the Sky Scraper once the item has been unlocked. Place the ticket into an Assembler to proceed.
jei.replikaentropie.data.info: Data Points are a player-bound resource acquired by scanning blocks and items using the Handheld Analyzer. Later you can also place an Entropic Data Miner to have it generate data from observing world events.
jei.replikaentropie.damaged_chipset.info: Damaged Chipsets may be found in various chests around the world. Finding one is the easiest way to get started with Replika Entropie.
jei.replikaentropie.fragmental_waste.inf: Fragmental Waste does not despawn and is very explosive. It also emits harmful particles. Consider wearing a Hazmat Suit when handling it.
